persistence.fetchGlobalVisibilityErrorTitle: Failed to fetch app visibility settings
persistence.fetchGlobalVisibilityErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong. Please reload the page. If this occurs frequently, please contact us.
persistence.saveGlobalVisibilityErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong while trying to save. Reload the page and try again.
persistence.fetchProjectVisibilitiesErrorTitle: Failed to fetch project visibility settings
persistence.fetchProjectVisibilitiesErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong. Please reload the page. If this occurs frequently, please contact us.
persistence.addProjectVisibilityErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong while trying to save. Reload the page and try again.
persistence.changeProjectVisibilityErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong while trying to save. Reload the page and try again.
persistence.removeProjectVisibilityErrorMessage: Something has gone wrong while trying to reset the visibility for this project to default. Reload the page and try again.

visibilityOverviewScreen.heading: Visibility Settings
visibilityOverviewScreen.projectsDescription: Not all projects have the same requirements. If you want the settings for a project to differ from the default, you can select the available functionality for the project directly.
visibilityOverviewScreen.globalDescription: Defines if the functionality is available in all projects by default. Projects can opt-out/opt-in below.

projectSelect.placeholder: Add an exception for a project

productDescription.teams: Bring your Microsoft Teams conversations and chats to your Jira issues and vice versa.
productDescription.email: Connect emails with Jira issues and send emails from Jira.
productDescription.meetings: Schedule Microsoft Teams and Outlook meetings in Jira. See availabilities and send meeting requests from Jira.
productDescription.todo: Create and see personal To Dos in your Jira issues.

disableProductDescription.teams: This will instantly disable the Microsoft Teams functionality for all projects without a listed exception. Are you sure you want to disable the Microsoft Teams functionality now?
disableProductDescription.email: This will instantly disable the email functionality for all projects without a listed exception. Are you sure you want to disable the email functionality now?
disableProductDescription.meetings: This will instantly disable the meetings functionality for all projects without a listed exception. Are you sure you want to disable the meetings functionality now?
disableProductDescription.todo: This will instantly disable the Microsoft To Do functionality for all projects without a listed exception. Are you sure you want to disable the Microsoft To Do functionality now?

overrideCheckBox.disableLabel: Also disable the functionality for projects with a listed exception.
overrideCheckBox.enableLabel: Also enable the functionality for projects with a listed exception.

wizard.headline: Manage visibility
wizard.intro: Grant the visibility to the right projects, so that everybody can do their job in the best way.

gettingStarted.intro3: Connect Jira with your Microsoft 365 tools for seamless teamwork. Enable the functionality you need below.
gettingStarted.teamsInfo: Connect your Microsoft Teams conversations and chat to your Jira issues. Using Jira Service Management? Let customers create support tickets in Microsoft Teams.
